# calloutsR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

El paquete **calloutsR** permite crear bloques de estilo tipo "callout" en documentos R Markdown o Quarto.

## Installation

You can install the development version of calloutsR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ManuelSpinola/calloutsR")
```

## Example
